summary: Two factory workers living in Northern Italy form a romantic connection.
cast: Giuliano Gemma|Stefania Sandrelli|Brizio Montinaro|Renato Scarpa|Cesira Abbiati|Rina Franchetti|Emilio Bonucci|Antonio Iodice|Pippo Starnazza|Walter Valdi|Bruno Cattaneo|Torquato Tessarini|Marisa Rosales|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Carla Mancini|Franco Morgan|Carla Todero
title: Delito de amor
